Verses: 1 appozhudhu Saamuvel Thailakkuppiyai Etuththu, Avan Thalaiyin Mel Vaarththu, Avanai Muththanjeydhu: Karththar Unnaith Thammutaiya Sudhandharaththinmel Thalaivanaaka Apishekampanninaar Allavaa?

2 nee Indraikku Ennaivittup Pokirapodhu, Penyameen Ellaiyaakiya Selsaakil Raakelin Kallaraiyantaiyil Irantu Manusharaik Kaanpaai; Avarkal Unnaip Paarththu: Nee Thetappona Kazhudhaikal Akappattadhu; Idho, Un Thakappan Kazhudhaikalinmelirundha Kavalaiyai Vittu, Ungalukkaaka Visaarappattu, En Makanukkaaka Ennaseyven? Enkiraan Endru Solluvaarkal.

3 nee Avvitaththai Vittu Appuram Katandhupoi, Thaaporilulla Samapoomiyil Serumpodhu, Thevanaip Paniyumpati Peththelukkup Pokira Moondru Manushar Ange Unnaik Kantu Sandhippaarkal, Oruvan Moondru Aattukkuttikalaiyum, Innoruvan Moondru Appangalaiyum, Veroruvan Thiraatcharasamulla Oru Thuruththiyaiyum Kontuvandhu,
4 unnutaiya Sukaseydhiyai Visaariththu, Unakku Irantu Appangalaik Kotuppaarkal; Avaikalai Nee Avarkal Kaiyile Vaangaventum.

5 pinpu Pelisdharin Thaanaiyam Irukkira Thevanutaiya Malaikkup Povaai; Ange Nee Pattanaththirkul Piravesikkaiyil, Metaiyilirundhu Irangivarukira Theerkkadharisikalin Koottaththirku Edhirppatuvaai; Avarkalukku Munpaakath Thampurum Melamum Naakasuramum Suramantalamum Pokum; Avarkal Theerkkadharisanam Solluvaarkal.
6 appozhudhu Karththarutaiya Aavi Unmel Iranguvaar; Nee Avarkalotekootath Theerkkadharisanam Solli, Veru Manushanaavaai.
7 indha Ataiyaalangal Unakku Neritumpodhu, Samayaththukku Etrapati Nee Sey; Thevan Unnote Irukkiraar.

8 nee Enakku Munne Kilkaalukku Irangippo; Sarvaanga Thakanapalikalaiyum Samaadhaanapalikalaiyum Seluththumpatikku, Naan Unnitaththil Varuven; Naan Unnitaththil Vandhu, Nee Seyya Ventiyadhai Unakku Arivikkumattum, Ezhunaal Kaaththiru Endraan.
9 avan Saamuvelai Vittup Pokumpati Thirumpinapodhu, Thevan Avanukku Vere Irudhayaththaik Kotuththaar; Andha Ataiyaalangal Ellaam Andraiya Thiname Nerittadhu.

10 avarkal Andha Malaikku Vandha Podhu, Idho, Theerkkadharisikalin Koottam Avanukku Edhiraaka Vandhadhu; Appozhudhu Thevanutaiya Aavi Avanmel Iranginadhinaal, Avanum Avarkalukkulle Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaan.

11 adharku Munne Avanai Arindhavarkal Ellaarum Avan Theerkkadharisikalotirundhu, Theerkkadharisanam Sollukiradhaik Kantapodhu: Keesin Kumaaranukku Vandhadhu Enna? Savulum Theerkkadharisikalil Oruvano? Endru Andha Janangal Oruvarotoruvar Sollikkontaarkal.
12 adharku Ange Irukkiravarkalil Oruvan: Ivarkalukkuth Thakappan Yaar Endraan; Aadhalaal Savulum; Theerkkadharisikalil Oruvano? Enpadhu Pazhamozhiyaayitru.
13 avan Theerkkadharisanam Solli Mutindhapinpu, Metaiyin Mel Vandhaan.

14 appozhudhu Savulutaiya Siriya Thakappan: Neengal Enge Poneerkal Endru Avanaiyum Avan Velaikkaaranaiyum Kettaan. Adharku Avan Naangal Kazhudhaikalaith Thetappoi, Avaikalai Engung Kaanaadhapatiyinaal, Saamuvelitaththukkup Ponom Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Savulin Siriyadhakappan: Saamuvel Ungalukkuch Chonnadhu Enna? Adhaich Chol Endraan.

16 savul Than Siriyadhakappanaip Paarththu: Kazhudhaikal Akappattadhu Endru Engalukkuth Theermaanamaaich Chonnaar Endraan; Aanaalum Raajyapaaraththaippatrich Chaamuvel Sonnadhai Avanukku Arivikkavillai.
17 saamuvel Janangalai Mispaavile Karththaritaththil Varavazhaiththu,

18 isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththar Sollukiradhu Ennavendraal, Naan Isravelai Ekipdhilirundhu Purappatappanni, Ungalai Ekipdhiyar Kaikkum, Ungalai Irukappitiththa Ellaa Raajyaththaarin Kaikkum Neengalaakkivitten.

19 neengalo Ungalutaiya Ellaaththeengukalukkum Nerukkangalukkum Ungalai Neengalaakki Ratchiththa Ungal Thevanai Innaalile Purakkaniththu, Oru Raajaavai Engalmel Erpatuththum Endru Avaritaththil Kettukkonteerkal; Ippozhudhu Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Ungal Vamsangalinpatiyeyum, Aayirangalaana Ungal Servaikalinpatiyeyum, Vandhu Nillungal; Endraan.
20 saamuvel Isravelin Koththirangalaiyellaam Serappanninapinpu Penyameen Koththiraththinmel Seettu Vizhundhadhu.

21 avan Penyameen Koththiraththai Adhinutaiya Kutumpangalinpatiye Serappanninapinpu, Maaththiri Kutumpaththinmelum, Adhile Keesin Kumaaranaakiya Savulinmelum, Seettu Vizhundhadhu; Avanaith Thetinapodhu, Avan Akappatavillai.
22 avan Ini Inge Varuvaanaa Endru Avarkal Thirumpak Karththaritaththil Visaariththapodhu: Idho, Avan Thalavaatangalirukkira Itaththile Oliththukkontirukkiraan Endru Karththar Sonnaar.
23 appozhudhu Avarkal Oti, Angeyirundhu Avanai Azhaiththukkontuvandhaarkal; Avan Janangal Natuve Vandhu Nindrapodhu, Ellaa Janangalum Avan Tholukkuk Keezhaayirukkaththakka Uyaramullavanaayirundhaan.

24 appozhudhu Saamuvel Ellaa Janangalaiyum Nokki: Karththar Therindhukontavanaip Paarungal, Samasdha Janangalukkullum Avanukkuch Chamaanamaanavan Illai Endraan; Appozhudhu Janangal Ellaarum Aarppariththu: Raajaa Vaazhka Endraarkal.
25 saamuvel Raajaangaththin Muraiyai Janangalukkuth Theriviththu, Adhai Oru Pusdhakaththil Ezhudhi, Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Vaiththu, Janangalaiyellaam Avaravar Veettukku Anuppivittaan.
26 savulum Kipiyaavilirukkira Than Veettukkup Ponaan; Iraanuvaththil Thevan Evarkal Manadhai Evinaaro, Avarkalum Avanotekootap Ponaarkal.
27 aanaalum Peliyaalin Makkal: Ivanaa Nammai Ratchikkappokiravan Endru Solli, Avanukkuk Kaanikkai Kontu Varaamal Avanai Asattaipanninaarkal; Avano Kaadhukelaadhavan Pola Irundhaan.
